AboutCard1: My name is Saim Ahmad, and I am a first year undergraduate at UCLA studying Computer Science. I am a fullstack developer, proficient in React and Node.js, looking for an internship as a software engineer.

Palace.title: Palace Properties Internship
description: Created a dashboard to help organize incoming reservation requests with a kanban board where managers can update the statuses of different reservations using tags
Implemented a UI to help managers modify reservation requests
Designed and produced an interface to let property managers block out different date ranges that the property would be unavailable for renting

AmazonChecker.title: Amazon Price Detector
description: Built RESTful APIs with express in Node.js to send and retrieve information from a database
APIs send data to a webscraper designed with puppeteer uses the information to send emails to users if item prices drop
